articles.title: Adams attempts to downplay fears NYC immigrant children are skipping school
articles.description: Mayor Adams on Tuesday poured cold water on the idea that deportation fears since President Trump's inauguration have led to a drop-off in New York City public school attendance — despite early signs that some immigrant families are fearful about sending their children to school.
